RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Extracted from http://aas.org/aastex/facility-keywords on Wed 27th May 2015.

FIELD.name: Gamma-Ray
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Gamma-Ray observing capability (above 120 keV)

FIELD.name: X-Ray
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has X-Ray observing capability (0.1 - 100 Angstroms or 0.12 - 120 keV)

FIELD.name: Ultraviolet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Ultraviolet observing capability (100 - 3000 Angstroms or 1.2 - 120 eV)

FIELD.name: Optical
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Optical observing capability (3000 - 10,000 Angstroms or 0.3 - 1 micron)

FIELD.name: Infrared
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Infrared observing capability (1 - 100 microns)

FIELD.name: Millimeter
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Millimeter observing capability (0.1 - 10 millimeters or 3000 - 30 GHz)

FIELD.name: Radio
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Radio observing capability (below 30 GHz)

FIELD.name: Particles
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Facility has Neutrinos, particles, and gravitational waves observing capability
